name: Phi Ta Khon Festival PONYPINK x Size Music TH
description:
Phi Ta Khon is a part of the big merit-making ceremony of the Northeastern Thai, also known as "Boon Luang" or is another famous and famous tradition of Loei province. There is a procession of Phi Ta Khon dressed like ghosts and demons wearing large masks that are unique and have different beautiful patterns. Show merriment in the procession that stretches through the streets There is a legend told the Phi Ta Khon procession took place when Phra Vessantara and Nang Matsee were leaving the forest to return to the city. Many wild ghosts and various beasts mourned, therefore, flocked to hide themselves with the people to send both Therefore, the pattern was brought from the stories about Phi Ta Khon to make clothes.
This work is done in collaboration with Size Music TH.
